text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a ISSUE
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActSuppliedItemDetectedIssueCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActAdministrativeDetectedIssueCode

name: ActDetectedIssueCode
title: ActDetectedIssueCode
description: Identifies types of detected issues for Act class "ALRT"
